main.name: David Goldstein
main.description: full stack engineer, father, kind human
main.bio: I love working with smart, passionate, and kind people! Originally specializing in Arabic language and International Studies, I fell in love with the power of programming while working in the Intelligence Community. I am continually looking for the next challenge to take on and ways to think outside the box!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Majors in Computer Science, International Studies, and Arabic Language

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Core developer on cutting-edge service mesh platform, assist leading sprint planning and review cycles, extensive front-end work on service-mesh dashboard.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developer on platform service for Intelligence Analysts giving presentations, conduct research with faculty at the National Intelligence University on immigration of Arabic-speaking populations.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Report on migrations throughout the Middle East for the creation of US foreign policy, oversee disbursement of US funding to NGOs in the Middle East.
